title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income/loss in million euros, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Net income/loss in million euros has increased over the Year

Net income/loss in million euros is rapidly increasing from 2010 to 2013, gradually decreasing from 2013 to 2014, rapidly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Net income/loss in million euros about 121.5 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Net income/loss in million euros about 23.1 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income/loss in million euros, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2014.
